Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: La Cabane A Histoires - EP 17
programme.desc: Four best friends have a secret: after school, they climb up to their hidden tree house. It contains a priceless treasure: books! Each day, the children tell one another stories, travelling to exciting fairy-tale worlds.

programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Les 3 Mousquetaires - EP 1
programme.desc: Charlotte, Olivia, Ines, and Isa lead double lives: ordinary young ladies at court, they secretly train to become the best fighters in the kingdom. They are the Three Musketeers! Bound by an unbreakable friendship, they thwart plots and protect the king from his enemies.

programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule - EP 20
programme.desc: Sigis pretends to be moving into a friend's house. Vic practices to be a model and does an advert for shoes.

programme.desc: Marie-Francoise has led a life of feminist commitment from a very early age. After working to rebuild her country, Haiti, she was forced to leave Port-au-Prince with her children. In Quebec, she is continuing her combat, focusing on helping isolated women.

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 4
programme.desc: Iceland, a small country lost in the cold waters of the Atlantic, just a few kilometres from the Arctic Circle. As well as glaciers, which are constantly monitored, the island also has 130 volcanoes, around thirty of which are active. Thanks to the locals, Sophie Jovillard discovers the complex relationship between the volcanoes and glaciers that make up Iceland.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: La Grande Galerie Francophone
programme.desc: Every week and in public, Ali Baddou and his group of columnists receive French-speaking artists who are at the heart of current events and move the lines. Space for exchanges, creations and surprises, ''La grande galerie francophone'' celebrates art in all its diversity and shares it with everyone.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 3
programme.desc: Accused by several women of infecting them with HIV, Nicolas asks the law firm to defend him. Meanwhile, Paule is horrified to discover that Irene has handed over the care of her son to Simon's mother. Particularly as the latter's confused state means she mistakes him for her own son.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 4
programme.desc: Paule becomes Simon's surrogate mother. Warnier profits from the situation to tell his dying mother that he intends to marry Paule and adopt Simon. Meanwhile, Paule takes on the defence of a young police officer accused of committing a tragic error during a raid in an inner-city housing estate.

programme.title: 20h30 Le Dimanche
programme.desc: Film, music, sport, literature, politics... Laurent Delahousse's guests talk about themselves and their lives, their careers and their projects, and discuss the news making the headlines of the day. The programme closes with a live musical performance.

programme.title: Monsieur La Souris
programme.desc: Mr. La Souris, a kind vagabond with good manners, opens the doors in front of a nightclub. One evening, a car arrives containing a body. La Souris picks up the dead man's wallet. When he becomes a police suspect in the murder enquiry, he decides to carry out his own investigation.

programme.title: Les Mains Sales
programme.desc: The St Lawrence Valley, 1759. The daily life of Marie, a native slave in the service of a surgeon, is gloomy and alienating. Until the day she meets a little girl she assumes to be her child.

programme.title: Des Racines & Des Ailes - EP 7
programme.desc: Champagne, Saint-emilion, the Loire Valley and Burgundy. In France today, four exceptional wine-growing regions have been awarded the prestigous title of world heritage sites. We explore these landscapes shaped by man...

programme.title: Reinventer Sa Ville
programme.desc: By 2050, more than half of the world's population will live in cities. Metropolises, responsible for 70% of greenhouse gas emissions, are at the heart of the climate challenge. In Europe, innovative, sustainable, and inclusive solutions are emerging, designed and tested in collaboration with citizens.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Chef Pays - EP 92
programme.desc: Cooking is a way of building bridges between countries and sharing cultural diversity. Starting with a typical ingredient from the French overseas departments and territories, the chef creates a unique dish.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Interieurs - EP 1
programme.desc: Anne-Catherine Verwaerde goes to Beauvaisis, reputed for clay work and its factories. Then, she discovers a huge secondhand shop where Gaylord, its owner, stores objects that he has carefully chosen and retrieved by clearing uninhabited houses in the region.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 16
programme.desc: Aurelia and Alan Roura are married. Alan, a skipper, is embarking on his third Vendee Globe in 2024. Aurelia remains on land. She must single-handedly manage her husband's business and the latest news from his ocean race, while balancing their family life and relationship.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 52
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Partie De Campagne - EP 48
programme.desc: Surrounded by fields, near a vast forest and a pretty stream, lies the village of Bellefontaine. It's home to the fun-loving gang of friends Raphael, Lina, P'tit Pied and Grande Perche. Bubbling over with imagination, they fill every day with exciting adventures.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 9
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi - EP 26
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: L'afrik En Contes - EP 17
programme.desc: A very powerful king complains that he only has sons. His is then offered the chance of having a daughter, but he has to be prepared to make innumerable sacrifices.

programme.title: L'afrik En Contes - EP 18
programme.desc: In a village lives a very beautiful girl, so beautiful that people come from far and wide just to see her. Unfortunately the village has no more water. To break the curse, the young girl must be sacrificed.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans - EP 19
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1682
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'enquete, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ? - EP 18
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: Le Journal International
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Meurtres A Honfleur
programme.desc: Agitation at the port of Honfleur: the body of MP Jean-Charles Villiers is found covered in salt and sand. A staging reminiscent of the Harlequin legend. Captain Justine Leroy leads the investigation with her deputy Vianney, helped by Paul Mesnil, a former police officer turned restaurateur.

programme.title: Foot! (1/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Foot! (2/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: C'est Mon Homme
programme.desc: Julien Delaunay disappeared on a battlefield during the Great War. When the press publishes a portrait of a man with amnesia, Julie is sure she recognises her husband. So they meet up again and learn to love each other all over again. However, another woman wants him...

This will be the last time that the tournament will have eight teams. Australia are the defending champions, having won their seventh title in 2022.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 23
programme.desc: Still regarded as a legend in his native Belgium, Luc Nilis lit up the Pro League and Dutch football, winning numerous titles and cups with Anderlecht and PSV Eindhoven. His 2000 move to Aston Villa looked set to make him a Premier League star, but instead, it almost ended in tragedy. We catch up with the former striker to hear his incredible story and discover how his new role in coaching has become his biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Liverpool (MW11) - EP 110
programme.desc: Liverpool won this exact fixture 2-0 last season but haven’t won consecutive away league games against Man City since a run of three between 1987 and 1991.

programme.title: Brentford vs Newcastle United (MW11) - EP 107
programme.desc: Brentford have won just one of their eight Premier League games against Newcastle (D1 L6), though it was a 4-2 victory in this exact fixture last season.

programme.title: WCCB Ben Whittaker vs. Liam Cameron II
programme.desc: From Resorts World Arena in Birmingham, one of the top prospects in boxing, Olympic Silver Medalist Ben Whittaker, meets Liam Cameron in a highly anticipated light heavyweight rematch of their dramatic split draw last November. In their first meeting on the undercard of Beterbiev/Bivol from Saudi Arabia, Whittaker was unable to finish the bout when both fighters fell from the ring.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the Hohhot Grand Prix, and stop to get to know the world's #1 ranked fighter Aleksandar Kukolj. We then head to Russia to witness the effect that Judo has on the Russian people.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 9
programme.desc: The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 10
programme.desc: Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 11
programme.desc: The Squirrels find Duggee's cheerleader pompoms, so he shows them his old moves. Time to practice: Duggee at the chess board, the Squirrels as a squad. There's a big match ahead...

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, Duggee forgets how to woof, Duggly comes to visit, Roly celebrates Potato Time, and Billy teaches everyone the Bugatron dance!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: Betty recalls the first time she pushed the red button, the Squirrels explore a range of emotions with Happy, Angry Bull tells a not-so-sleepy bedtime story, and the gerbils sing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 8
programme.desc: Spring has sprung! There are cute baby animals to meet and frolic with.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 30
programme.desc: Bingo finds a toy turtle at the playground and wants to take him home, but Dad says it's not the right thing to do.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 31
programme.desc: When mum's sister Brandy comes over for a visit, she brings the kids onesies as a present, which has an unexpected effect on Bingo.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 32
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo hide under the house and spy on two mysterious tradies working in the backyard, wondering what they're up to.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 104
programme.desc: The Teletubbies have their favourite things and The Noo-Noo wants to join in. When the Tubby Phone rings, the Teletubbies and The Noo-Noo do the Tubby Phone Dance together.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing and "Do the Tubby!".

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 41
programme.desc: Zip and the friends are going on a fairy tale scavenger hunt. But when Zip becomes unsure about the clues, will the friends still get their magical fairy tale prize?

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: Dog and Pug meet two hapless superheroes trying to outdo each other to save the city.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 52
programme.desc: Messy goes to OKIDO to play with Zim and Zam's new discovery, but will he and his friends get back from this adventure in time?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S2) - EP 1
programme.desc: When the OKIDO lighthouse breaks down, Messy, Felix, Zoe and Zoom travel to Mystery Mountain in search of a light that never goes out.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 43
programme.desc: Monty believes that parents can fix everything, until he is told by his parents that they cannot fix his toy helicopter.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S3) - EP 12
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran visit a ruined castle near the beach. JoJo imagines what the castle looked like before it was a ruin and finds it's just like being on a Captain Chloe adventure!

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S3) - EP 11
programme.desc: JoJo, Gran Gran and all the family plan an Easter feast. When there isn't enough space in the kitchen to prepare the food, it's time for a Gran Gran plan outside in the garden.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 23
programme.desc: John's yellow bouncy ball is too bouncy, but Sarah thinks she knows where the solution can be found...

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 24
programme.desc: Cake is tired of living in the fridge, so Sarah & Duck help him think about where else he would like to stay.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S23) - EP 4
programme.desc: Percy causes confusion for everyone and prompts delays, when he spends too much time panicking over nothing.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 27
programme.desc: Dad has rudely plonked himself on one end of the seesaw. So Bluey and Bingo round up the entire playground to help move him off, but they still need to find one more friend.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 28
programme.desc: It's Bluey's first trip to the cinema, but she's worried the movie will be too scary. When Bingo starts running amok in the theatre, she must conquer her fear and help Dad out.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 29
programme.desc: When Muffin is told that she is special by her dad, she interprets it as an excuse to do anything she wants, which means playing Bluey and Bingo's game of library her way.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 3
programme.desc: Supertato and Broccoli go on a pirate adventure with Captain Pak Choi, but they don't realise she intends on plundering Evil Pea's freezer and stealing all her shiny things.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 40
programme.desc: King Tiger has met his perfect partner and he is getting married. It's going to be a royal wedding!! The squirrels are to be special Guests of Honour, but who is King Tiger marrying!?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 41
programme.desc: Duggee and the squirrels are tidying up - its Bring your Grandparents to Squirrel Club Day. Duggee has his Grandparents badge so he knows what they will like, a nice cup of tea.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, Duggee forgets how to woof, Duggly comes to visit, Roly celebrates Potato Time, and Billy teaches everyone the Bugatron dance!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 15
programme.desc: The grimbots attach a bit of the Taj Mahal to GrimHQ. It remains to be seen whether the Go Jetters can fix the glitch.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 16
programme.desc: When Grandmaster Glitch makes popcorn in Mount Etna, Italy, he blocks the volcano and endangers farms on its slopes.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 17
programme.desc: Glitch wants to ski, so the Grimbots give Table Mountain a snowy peak, which threatens its rare plants.

programme.title: My World Kitchen (S3) - EP 5
programme.desc: Aksara's curry contains a very special ingredient: tamarind.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: In this episode Andy, Jen and Scout head to the Pacific ocean, off the tropical islands of Hawaii, on a baby animal mission to see how a baby humpback whale prepares for its 5000 km migration North to the rich feeding grounds of Alaska.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S7) - EP 12
programme.desc: Captain Captain, Sandy and Seaweed get a new 'Smart Parrot' to help make life easier around the Scarlet Squid. Unfortunately it only ends up making life harder for the pirates!

programme.title: Panda and Krash (S1) - EP 22
programme.desc: Krash finds a football somewhere and then he plays with it with He-He and Raccoon.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 13
programme.desc: When Bingo stops playing Bluey's spy game, their grown-up controlling device stops working properly! Bluey now sees how important Bingo is and needs to win her back!

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 14
programme.desc: Forced to wait five minutes in front of a restaurant for their takeaway, Bluey and Bingo become restless for entertainment, pushing the very limits of Dad's patience.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 15
programme.desc: Playing 'Butterflies' in the backyard is great fun, until Bluey runs away with Judo leaving Bingo all alone. Now poor Bingo's heartbroken and Bluey needs to make amends.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 14
programme.desc: The Cobs try to capture Supertato while Evil Pea is on holiday, but it goes wrong, resulting in Evil Pea getting covered in flour and custard over in the Bath Product's Aisle.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 10

programme.desc: When they're accidentally shut in the shed, Duggee shows the Squirrels how to make the time pass with calm breathing and made-up games. The Squirrels cope so well. Does Duggee?

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 8
programme.desc: Spring has sprung! There are cute baby animals to meet and frolic with.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 31
programme.desc: When mum's sister Brandy comes over for a visit, she brings the kids onesies as a present, which has an unexpected effect on Bingo.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 32
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo hide under the house and spy on two mysterious tradies working in the backyard, wondering what they're up to.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 33
programme.desc: Muffin is playing Grouchy Granny at a garage sale, making Dad push her on an old mobility scooter, but when a real Grouchy Granny wants to buy it, Muffin won't budge.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 105
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Dispy, Laa‐Laa and Po enjoy Tiddlytubbies Songtime. Then it is time for Teletubbies Songtime. The Teletubbies sing solo before singing all together.

programme.desc: Dog and Pug meet an inventor in his space lab. The inventor shows them his robots.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 44
programme.desc: Jeanie gets mad when she doesn't win a game, leaving Monty wondering whether you can turn a sore loser into a good loser.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S3) - EP 13
programme.desc: JoJo and her cousin Lexi are learning how to swim underwater - but it's a little bit tricky. It's time for a Gran Gran plan.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and "accepted wisdom" to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, the Agenda quite simply sets the agenda. You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Talk Africa
programme.desc: Talk Africa is a weekly discussion show that brings the most influential voices in Africa to the world. Broadcast from CGTN’s production center in the Kenyan capital, Nairobi, Talk Africa looks at Africa and the world from an African perspective.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues. We examine the changes and growth in China's domestic leagues, as the country undergoes an incredible economic transformation.

programme.desc: A groundbreaking 30-minute interview show, giving an in-depth look into how top companies around the world conduct business and how policymakers view the fast-changing world economy. programme.title: Moving Voices in Spain - EP 5
programme.desc: When you try to understand a country, is there anything that reveals more than its music? "Moving Voices" follows Korea's artists travelling to different places around the world. While they experience different countries' music and cultures, they embark on a journey to find their true self as a singer. What kind of music and stories will these singers share, as they understand the culture and people from the world?

programme.title: You Are The Best! - EP 19
programme.desc: What is the warmest, happiest, most deeply touching word in the world? "Mom!" Swept up into the tempest of a new life after her father's death, the youngest daughter of this family begins a search for happiness with her mother.

programme.title: You Are The Best! - EP 20
programme.desc: What is the warmest, happiest, most deeply touching word in the world? "Mom!" Swept up into the tempest of a new life after her father's death, the youngest daughter of this family begins a search for happiness with her mother.

programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4 - EP 298
programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.title: The Return of Superman - EP 595
programme.desc: Parenting challenges of "Superman" , the first hero that children encounter when they are born.

programme.title: Our Golden Days - EP 23
programme.desc: Everyone has their golden days. Whether now, in the past, or the future. A heartfelt family melodrama that resonates across generations, exploring those dazzling days we all encounter with different meanings.

programme.title: Our Golden Days - EP 24
programme.desc: Everyone has their golden days. Whether now, in the past, or the future. A heartfelt family melodrama that resonates across generations, exploring those dazzling days we all encounter with different meanings.

programme.title: KBS WORLD News Today
programme.desc: Bringing you KBS World daily English news, anchored by Choi Kyu-yeon.

programme.title: My Neighbor, Charles - EP 503
programme.desc: Foreigners who have left their familiar worlds behind and come to the unfamiliar land of Korea! A vivid, real-life adaptation story of foreigners trying to settle into Korean society for various reasons. This reality program warmly portrays their concerns about jobs, marriage, and parenting while living in Korea.

programme.title: Music Bank - EP 1270
programme.desc: The best tunes in Korea! the most sensational music show on TV satisfies all your senses! Fantastic performances and Awe-inspiring harmony by the nation's top musicians! Follow the latest trend in the Korean music scene through the K-chart, a summary of the week's hottest songs.

programme.title: Hello Monster - EP 11
programme.desc: I find my true self through you. A man and a woman meet again at a crime scene - like sworn enemies. They get to work together to solve the crime concealing their true intentions. Then, they fall in love with each other and starts to find their identities.

programme.title: Marie and Her Three Daddies - EP 16
programme.desc: Marie's turbulent journey to find her father leads to the birth of an eccentric new family, one that proves stronger than blood and more persistent than DNA.

programme.title: A Graceful Liar - EP 26
programme.desc: A bold yet heartbreaking story of a mother and daughter-in-law who meet through marriage and wage a war of lies to seize the Geonhyang family, struggling for a dramatic reversal of fortune.

programme.title: Are You Human? - EP 21
programme.desc: A young man falls into a coma. His mother creates an artificial intelligence robot in his likeness that must pretend to be a real human and fool people into believing that he's real until the real son wakes up. He is placed in the midst of a fierce power struggle of a business mogul family in the young man's stead. There's a woman who protects him as a bodyguard but doesn't even know if he's a human or a robot!

programme.title: Are You Human? - EP 22
programme.desc: A young man falls into a coma. His mother creates an artificial intelligence robot in his likeness that must pretend to be a real human and fool people into believing that he's real until the real son wakes up. programme.title: Stars' Top Recipe at Fun-Staurant - EP 294
programme.desc: Gourmet celebrities team up to explore the world of convenience stores and share their secret recipes!

programme.title: The Merchant : Gaekju 2015 - EP 17
programme.desc: This drama tells a story of a successor of the ruined merchant family. Cheon Bongsam, who begins his life as a market tout, becomes the most powerful merchant of Joseon after going through experiences as a head of a private merchant army and a chief master merchant.

programme.title: Billionaire Story
programme.desc: A street separates two worlds. On one side, there is a hard-working life in the market with both hardships and laughter; one the other, it’s the life of rich and wealthy families who are intriguing and trembling.

programme.title: Hot Door Night 23
programme.desc: Catch all the fun and laughter right here as we bring you Taiwan's top-grossing variety entertainment show that will keep you wanting for more!

programme.title: The Way To Happiness
programme.desc: The difference in values and gulf in life achievements of the Gao brothers result in conflicts and tension between their respective families.

programme.title: Bad and Crazy - EP 5
programme.desc: The story is about Su Yeol (Lee Dong Wook), a corrupt yet practical detective who manifests a split personality K (Wi Ha Joon) who harbours a sense of justice. Watch how he tries to solve various crimes!

programme.title: Destined - EP 16
programme.desc: Lin Yu Ru (Song Yi), the daughter of a cloth merchant who’s suffered childhood hardships, is married off to Gu Jiu Si (Bai Jing Ting), the notorious son of Yangzhou's wealthiest family, infamous for his indolent ways. They grow closer despite their differences.

programme.title: The Long River - EP 36
programme.desc: After a huge flood during the 15th year of his reign, the young Emperor Kang Xi (Luo Jin) conducts civil service examinations to recruit talented individuals to solve the problems plaguing the Yellow River, allowing the 24-year-old Chen Huang (Yin Fang) an opportunity to come to the fore.

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride - EP 97

programme.desc: Eun Seo Yeon is not rich, but everyone knows she has a warm heart. One day, she discovers that the man, Kang Baek San, whom she calls ‘father’ is actually her real parents’ enemy! She embarks on a revenge journey…

programme.title: The Litchi Road - EP 22
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Adapted from the same-name novel, the drama features a minor official, Li Shande (Lei Jia Yin), during the Tang Dynasty. He overcomes numerous hardships and travels thousands of miles to deliver lychees from Gaozhou in Lingnan to Chang’an.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 4
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Tai Cho-fuk’s decoys infiltrated the police force all those years ago. And now Ko Ho-yin suspects there must be more than one mole in the force, so he’s determined to get to the bottom of this matter. Based on certain clues, Ding Siu-fei reaches the container yard in his search.

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 11
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. programme.title: Kill You Love You - EP 1
programme.desc: Rookie assassin Su Xian Ling (Zhu Li Lan) accidentally takes the order to assassinate Dong Fang Jing (Li Ruotian), unaware that the employer is the city lord himself. Jing pretends to be foolish to protect himself and falls for the unconventional Xian Ling.

programme.title: Kill You Love You - EP 2

programme.title: See Her Again - EP 10
programme.desc: A 90s Hong Kong's Serious Crimes Unit officer Yeung Kwong Yiu (William Chan) unexpectedly finds himself in 2018, where he meets his same-aged partner, Chan Hoi Ching (Cya Liu). They follow a series of elusive clues to investigate a long-unsolved serial murder.

programme.title: Sinister Beings 2 - EP 12
programme.desc: Tin-cho worries about Cheung Hei, so he decides to ask Kwun-fung to help put her mind at ease. Kwun-fung also arranges for Cheung Hei to meet up with Wing-sze. Wai-lik and Ka-yu plan to get married. But Chun-sum still lives an empty life without love. Chun-pong is going to be promoted. In a large-scale operation, he runs into his “old love” Lan, who disappeared many years ago.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 5
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Chow Chun-kit is reinstated, but his innocence is doubtful. To reveal the truth, he asks Ko Ho-yin for help. The duo start to collaborate. Lau Yu-fan pays Lee Nga-man a visit. Lee Nga-man keeps improving himself in prison. The task force need more people, so Cheung Kin-bong joins Chow Chun-kit’s team.

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 12
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2078
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 10
programme.desc: Based on Yee-ting’s statement, Inspector Lau approaches Lai-kei and questions her. Lai-kei thinks Yee-ting falsely accuses her of homicide, so she slaps her. Ho-yee wants to make up with Ko Tsun. But she sees a disheveled Chi-lam showing up at Ko Tsun’s home. On the pretext of a fire breaking out at Diamond Plaza, Sau-yi wants Ho-yee to put the group’s matters on the back burner and deal with the issues in the aftermath of the incident.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 701-750) VVD Mandarin - EP 750
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Class of Distinction - EP 4
programme.desc: Po (Leon Lai) worked in an advertising company, but his work was not appreciated. He was upset and quitted his job. He took Yi’s (Jessica Hester Hsuan) suggestion and become a teacher. There he met Sam (Theresa Lee), the school’s social worker. She inspired Po and he decided to become a good teacher. His effort and dedication gradually earned him support and respect from the students and his fellow colleagues.

programme.title: My Sister of Eternal Flower - EP 17
programme.desc: FA LAI-CHU (Charmaine Sheh) is a kindhearted and innocent woman with the IQ of a ten-year-old. When her parents passed away, she shouldered the responsibility for the care of her younger sister and brother.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 3
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 4

programme.title: Learning Curve Of A Warlord, The - EP 23
programme.desc: In the Warlord Era, DIK KEI (Dicky Cheung) is a lowly captain without any ambition. He has been using his crafty ideas and fast-talking to survive the past twenty years. Due to successfully saving Marshal MUNG TAI-TUNG (Tsoi Kwok Hing), he is successively promoted seven grades and becomes a bully calling the shots in Sing Wai Town.

programme.title: Learning Curve Of A Warlord, The - EP 25
programme.desc: In the Warlord Era, DIK KEI (Dicky Cheung) is a lowly captain without any ambition. He has been using his crafty ideas and fast-talking to survive the past twenty years. Due to successfully saving Marshal MUNG TAI-TUNG (Tsoi Kwok Hing), he is successively promoted seven grades and becomes a bully calling the shots in Sing Wai Town.

programme.title: Learning Curve Of A Warlord, The - EP 26
programme.desc: In the Warlord Era, DIK KEI (Dicky Cheung) is a lowly captain without any ambition. He has been using his crafty ideas and fast-talking to survive the past twenty years. Due to successfully saving Marshal MUNG TAI-TUNG (Tsoi Kwok Hing), he is successively promoted seven grades and becomes a bully calling the shots in Sing Wai Town.

programme.title: Class of Distinction - EP 5
programme.desc: Po (Leon Lai) worked in an advertising company, but his work was not appreciated. He was upset and quitted his job. He took Yi’s (Jessica Hester Hsuan) suggestion and become a teacher. There he met Sam (Theresa Lee), the school’s social worker. She inspired Po and he decided to become a good teacher. His effort and dedication gradually earned him support and respect from the students and his fellow colleagues.

programme.title: My Sister of Eternal Flower - EP 18
programme.desc: FA LAI-CHU (Charmaine Sheh) is a kindhearted and innocent woman with the IQ of a ten-year-old. When her parents passed away, she shouldered the responsibility for the care of her younger sister and brother.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 5
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 6

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 6
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Learning Curve Of A Warlord, The - EP 25
programme.desc: In the Warlord Era, DIK KEI (Dicky Cheung) is a lowly captain without any ambition. He has been using his crafty ideas and fast-talking to survive the past twenty years. Due to successfully saving Marshal MUNG TAI-TUNG (Tsoi Kwok Hing), he is successively promoted seven grades and becomes a bully calling the shots in Sing Wai Town.

programme.title: Learning Curve Of A Warlord, The - EP 26
programme.desc: In the Warlord Era, DIK KEI (Dicky Cheung) is a lowly captain without any ambition. He has been using his crafty ideas and fast-talking to survive the past twenty years. Due to successfully saving Marshal MUNG TAI-TUNG (Tsoi Kwok Hing), he is successively promoted seven grades and becomes a bully calling the shots in Sing Wai Town.

programme.title: Birth of A Hero - EP 16
programme.desc: To avoid all the strife caused by the gangland power struggles, YUK WAN-LUNG (Edwin Siu) and his elder sister YUK KIU-FUNG (Rachel Kan) lead a quiet life, running an inn. Unexpectedly, WAN-LUNG is determined to take part in the New Hero Contest, seeking to win his ex, NGAI BING-BING (Roxanne Tong), back. After WAN-LUNG exposes a scandal involving the East Wing imperial guards, he is incarcerated by SAU PAK-KWAN (Ben Wong), a commander of the East Wing.

programme.title: Just Love - EP 5
programme.desc: Judge KO HEI MAN (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER) and KOT KWOK KWONG (CHAN KAM HUNG, SUNNY) have agreed that MAN will concentrate on her career while KWONG will be taking care of the housework after they get married. Everything is in harmony until KWONG’s father discovers MAN and KWONG’s pre-marriage written agreement. Their relationship complicates ever since._x000D__x000D_ To make things worse, KWONG breaks the agreement and demands to have his own career.

programme.title: Get On A Flat - EP 1
programme.desc: Rewind to the 2008 financial crisis and supermarket manager Che Chi-ming (Andrew Lam) hurriedly sells his apartment. Who could have known even though Chi-ming has been chasing after property prices for 14 years, he still cannot get on the property ladder once again. A middle class lifestyle is tragically transformed into a "midlife crisis"._x000D__x000D_Chi-ming’s wife Man Wai (Elena Kong) is obsessed with property ownership. She goes to work as a part-time maid at some luxury home.

programme.title: Fist Within Four Walls, A - EP 10
programme.desc: CHOR AU-KUEN (Ruco Chan) bears the grief of the loss of his family and returns to the walled city in hopes of finding his long lost sister, only to find out that the place he grew up in has become a lawless no man's land. Concealing his real identity as a Bajiquan master, he creates a new identity and gets acquainted with a feisty hair salon lady boss, TIU LAN (Nancy Wu), a dentist, DUEN YING-FUNG (Benjamin Yuen), and a worker, BUT TAK-LIU (Lam Tsz Sin).

programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 10
programme.desc: During the 1930s in Hong Kong, where east meets west, feminist activists started campaigning for women's rights, seeking to uproot the phenomenon of men's superiority over women. Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.

programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 11
programme.desc: During the 1930s in Hong Kong, where east meets west, feminist activists started campaigning for women's rights, seeking to uproot the phenomenon of men's superiority over women. Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.

programme.title: Face to Face
programme.desc: Tamotsu dies in a skiing accident and his roommate Yoshio marries his wife as well as inherits his entire fortune. At Tamotsu's funeral, Yoshio sees a badly disfigured old man and that is only the beginning of an evil downfall for him...

programme.title: A Chinese Tall Story
programme.desc: While finding ways to rescue his disciples, Monk Tripitaka meets the lizard imp Mei Yan, the ugliest woman alive. Despite the conflict between good and evil, he falls for Mei Yan who sacrifices herself to save him many times. The Monk breaks his "no killing" rule to save his disciples, and things get more complicated as Princess Galaxy appears...

programme.title: Love in a Fallen City
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name by the famous novelist Eileen Chang and directed by the equally acclaimed director Ann Hui, this romance story depicts the challenging relationship between an introverted Shanghai divorcee and a cynical Malaysian playboy during the Japanese invasion of Hong Kong in the 1940s. Will the lovers be together in the end?

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 2
programme.desc: Fanny appears to be an ordinary housewife but is in fact a mahjong expert. Deeply in love with her husband, she loses to a seductive woman, Curvy, both on the mahjong table and in competing for her husband's love. With the help from her mahjong master, Fanny vows to take on Curvy in the Mahjong King tournament!

programme.title: The Chinese Feast
programme.desc: Sun wants to start a new life as a chef in Canada and struggles to learn cooking skills from a restaurant owner, Au. While Sun will represent his restaurant to participate in a cooking competition, his skill is not good enough, and he has to seek help from a legendary master chef in order to win the ultimate challenge.

programme.title: Love and Let Love!
programme.desc: Cliff proposes to his girlfriend Terry but is killed in a car accident before she says "yes". Terry is devastated and inconsolable. When Cliff's ghost returns, they seem to go back to their good old days. However, Cliff is determined to help Terry get over his death and start anew.

programme.title: Model from Hell
programme.desc: Anna, an exceptional student in a modelling school, becomes the target of envy from fellow models, who all die mysteriously when they want to harm her. It turns out that when Anna is upset, she undergoes a terrifying transformation and can wield lethal psychic power...

programme.title: Behind the Yellow Line
programme.desc: A fresh graduate, Paul, strikes up an acquaintance with a pretty young girl, Monica, on the metro. Monica is involved in a love affair with a married man while Paul is also pursued by a rich girl. When Paul vows his true love for Monica, she suggests playing hide-and-seek with him in the metro to decide if they are fated to be together.

programme.title: Mahjong Heroes
programme.desc: A hero helps a young student deflect a cunning and malicious gambling tycoon who is out to take over the student's family business over a game of mahjong.

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Two private detectives want to gain fame by solving a series of robberies. However, they were fooled by the King of Thieves during the investigation. It was later discovered that all the robberies were related to a Japanese businessman, Miyamoto. Who is the real King of Thieves?

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the "Gang of Five" in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: Royal Tramp II
programme.desc: The leader of Dragon clan, Long Er, helps General Wu to overthrow Emperor Kang Xi. However, Long Er is betrayed by General Wu and is rescued by Xiao Bao. As a result, she bestows her virginity and martial arts power to Xiao Bao to fight against Wu. At the same time, Xiao Bao fortuitously unveils the hidden treasures from "The Sutra of 42 Chapters".

programme.title: Law Or Justice
programme.desc: Lawyer Yip defends a rapist and gets him acquitted. Yip's boyfriend Fong, a police inspector, knows he is guilty and despises Yip for not upholding justice. The victim's sister takes revenge by spiking the rapist's drink but is raped instead. This puts the rapist back in court. Will Yip choose to uphold law or justice this time?

programme.title: Tristar
programme.desc: Young priest Hong disguises himself to protect Bai, a prostitute, while Detective Liu investigates her ties to a prostitution ring. Hong finds Bai a lawful job and helps her negotiate with the underworld. Meanwhile, Liu's investigation causes misunderstandings - can he crack down on the gang? How will Hong manage his emotions as Bai falls for him?

programme.title: Hong Kong Hong Kong
programme.desc: After moving to Hong Kong, illegal immigrant Mang has no choice but to live in cramped quarters with male migrants who abuse her. In order to attain Hong Kong residency and a better life, she agrees to marry a lonely old carpenter. After her marriage, Mang crosses paths again with her ex-lover, and the two develop a passionate affair...

programme.title: Destiny's Champion
programme.desc: An aging fighter relives the mistakes of his violent past through a poor and streetwise kid, who severely injures his nemesis during a battle to win a girl's heart.

programme.title: Cop Shop Babes
programme.desc: Island East Police Station headed by Madam Lui is known for its "Cop Shop Babes" as all the officers there are female. Two police officers, Beer and Satay, apply for an internal transfer to this station in order to approach the girls. It is at this time that the police receives a bomb threat - can they resolve the case?

programme.title: Dream Lover
programme.desc: Ka Shing meets Kitty one day and they fall quickly in love. However, Kitty disappears shortly and when they meet years later, she is already married. To comfort himself, Ka Shing asks a mystic master to let Kitty appear in his dreams so that he can be with her constantly, even though she can only be his dream lover...

programme.title: Fat Choi Spirit
programme.desc: Andy is a mahjong master who is very popular in the neighbourhood. However, after being cursed by his ex-girlfriend, Andy always experiences bad luck when playing mahjong. Can he finally dodge this streak of bad luck?

programme.title: Everlasting Regret
programme.desc: Adapted from an award-winning Chinese novel, the story follows the life of a legendary Shanghai beauty Wang Qi Yao from her glamorous to her simpler days. She stays true to her own way of life while surviving the constant betrayal of her men, and bears witness to the waves of change to her city from 1947 to 1981.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well (Extended Version)
programme.desc: In this beloved Hong Kong comedy, the three Chang brothers living with their parents learn that love blossoms with nurture, but withers when taken for granted through haste, deceit, and selfishness. This extended version features an additional shootout scene that was omitted from the original theatrical release during Lunar New Year 2016.

programme.title: Lifeline
programme.desc: A heroic tale about Hong Kong's brave firefighters. These courageous men can march into disastrous firegrounds and risk their lives to save others. However, do they have the same courage to confront their personal issues?

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: Dino meets his dream girl Mandy and falls in love with her at first sight. However, she disappears suddenly and he only sees her again after nine years, when she is already married. To overcome the pain of losing his love, Dino finds a guru with supernatural power to make him meet Mandy in his dream.

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husband's mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price...

programme.title: The Story of Woo Viet
programme.desc: Former Vietnamese veteran Woo Viet arrives a refugee camp in Hong Kong and meets his pen pal Quan. Subsequently, he encounters Shum Ching, with whom he attempts to flee to the US. However, the pair end up stranded in Manila's Chinatown, where at the hands of the local triads Woo becomes a hired killer, while Shum is forced into prostitution.

programme.title: The Bare-footed Kid
programme.desc: A poor, bare-footed young man from the countryside arrives in the city to work with the friend of his dead father. When their dye shop is burnt down by a local strongman, he decides to fight back to protect all of them and save the shop.

programme.title: 97 Aces Go Places
programme.desc: Hao Shi becomes the new triad boss after his father is killed by the pretty swindler, Ling. While professional gunman Drunken Gun is tasked to help Hao Shi take revenge, Ling is hunted by gangster Lei, from whom she has conned 2 million dollars. In the process, Hao Shi and Drunken Gun accidentally arrest Lei instead...

programme.title: Man Of Iron
programme.desc: A fearless fighter, Chou Lian Huan has risen to power in Shanghai with his exceptional combat skills. He risks his life for hostess Shen Ju Fang and embarks on a series of fierce battles against the son of a notorious triad leader and his gang, ultimately becoming a scapegoat in the gang's deadly turf war.

programme.title: Till The End Of Time
programme.desc: This is Jenny Hu's stunning debut as a struggling singer who tries to keep her career and marriage intact. This movie also includes seven memorable hit songs.

programme.title: King Eagle
programme.desc: A young swordman, King Eagle, unwillingly gets involved in the internal affairs of a powerful clan and becomes their target. He is saved by the female chief of the clan, Lin, and falls in love with her. However, Lin's sister is part of all evil plots and betrays her. Even so, Lin begs King Eagle not to harm her sister.

programme.title: Tales Of Larceny
programme.desc: Connecting all the antics of bosses, monks, beggars, and thieves is the slippery and sinuous efforts of three pickpockets so adept at their chosen skill that they can even trick three beauties of their underwear without missing a step.

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Ling Hsiao and Kuan Wang Lung are two guard chiefs working for an old convoy master. Lung is secretly in love with Fang Yen, the master's granddaughter but Yen is attracted to Ling Hsiao instead. In order to win her back, Lung sets up a trap to steal the convoy and frames Ling Hsiao for it.

programme.title: The Proud Twins
programme.desc: Jiang Xiao Yu is separated from his twin brother as a baby after his parents are murdered. He is taken by a couple to Villains Valley and raised to be a villain by a host of outlaws. Jiang leaves the valley to explore the world when he grows up. Will he be able to avenge his parents and meet with his twin brother?

programme.title: River Of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband's death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: The Heroic Ones
programme.desc: Set in the Tang Dynasty, the 13 adopted sons of Sha Tuo King are all renowned as royal warriors. David Chiang plays the 13th Prince, a powerful fighter whose prestigious status provokes jealously, leading to a gruesome family feud.

programme.title: The Tiger And The Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: The Kung-Fu Instructor
programme.desc: Wong Yang is a famous martial artist who is forced to teach kung fu to the Mong Clan, an evil clan which is trying to destroy its nemesis, the Chow Clan. Chow Ping from the Chow Clan is a student of Wong's caught in the Mong's territory and as punishment, the Mong Clan wants to cut off Chow Ping's limbs. Wong steps in to defend his student.

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: The Water Margin
programme.desc: This is a martial arts epic directed by Chang Cheh. In the Sung Dynasty, the government is run by corrupt officials, so Sung Jiang gathers 108 outlaws at Mount Liang and establishes a band of patriotic heroes to end the repression of brutal overlords.

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keeper's daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: The Sword Stained With Royal Blood
programme.desc: Adapted from Jin Yong's novel, the movie depicts the havoc breaking out in the martial arts world when a warrior on the run uncovers a sword, a training manual, a treasure map and a secret message on the body of a deceased martial arts master.

programme.title: The Pure And The Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fang's fiance and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him...

programme.title: Demon Of The Lute
programme.desc: Lute demon Chin Mo has reappeared in the world to wreak havoc. Hsiao Feng Ling is ordered to help find a special bow and arrows that can counter the demon. Only Chiao Yin knows the whereabouts of the weapon. Hsiao and her classmate Old Naughty set out on an arduous journey to find Chiao. After overcoming many obstacles, they catch Chin Mo's man trying to snatch the bow and manage to stop him in time....

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70's Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sister's magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: The Cave Of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brother's Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang is trapped by seven seductive spider spirits who are hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing have to fight the spider spirits to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: The Rebel Intruders
programme.desc: Thousands of displaced refugees rush to the southern towns to avoid the civil war in north China. Three such young men trained with martial arts skills become sworn brothers, and accidentally got involved in the battle of the rebel leaders in town when they save a refugee girl. Can they fight back against the rebel gangs?

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: The Fake Ghost Catchers
programme.desc: Huan Zhu's ghost seeks help from "Fake Ghost Catchers" Bao Tuo and Zhou Peng, after a jealous suitor's ghost seeks vengeance by murdering her and now targeting her sister. Together with actor Wu Shun Chao who possesses a supernatural talent, they unite to protect Huan Zhu's sister from both mortal and spectral threats.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: Legend Of The Bat
programme.desc: It is rumoured that people can buy anything they desire on the mysterious Island of Bats so long as they have money. The charismatic swordsman Chu Liu Xiang and his friend travel to the island to seek answers but realize they are not the only ones who want to unveil the mystery of this place.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demon's clutches.

programme.title: Super Inframan
programme.desc: Transformed from a young laboratory researcher, the thunderbolt-fisted Inframan must battle Princess Dragon Mom who wakes up from hibernation to conquer the earth with her army of mutant monsters.

programme.title: Return Of The Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: The Qing court plots to kill all Shaolin disciples by burning down Shaolin Temple. This sudden fire killed almost everyone except for five disciples. To take revenge on the Qing court, the five of them train hard in different fighting styles to become "The Five Shaolin Masters".

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go
programme.desc: Hosted by Sam Tseng and Hsu Nai Lin, this top Taiwan variety show, splits celebrity guests into two teams to battle in various game segments.

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go
programme.desc: Hosted by Sam Tseng and Hsu Nai Lin, this top Taiwan variety show, splits celebrity guests into two teams to battle in various game segments.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.title: Chop Chop Show
programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: Super Taste: 48 Hour Burning Desire!
programme.desc: Super Taste focuses on funny travel style to discover destinations and local-dishes. Standing on audience's view point, program's hosts introduce every sightseeing sites with close-witness, young and humorous way to announce the spirits of Super Taste.

programme.title: Discover New Taiwan Step By Step
programme.desc: The creative production team goes around Taiwan in search of inspiring stories in the country. Get to know more unique individuals and discover the true spirit of Taiwan.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.title: Super Taste: Go Bananas! Corp.
programme.desc: Super Taste focuses on funny travel style to discover destinations and local-dishes. Standing on audience's view point, program's hosts introduce every sightseeing sites with close-witness, young and humorous way to announce the spirits of Super Taste.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.title: Chop Chop Show
